fixes.name: MTM Stress T-1  (In CAD)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM Stress (in CAD)],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Comparison date],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM Stress (in CAD)],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested Tableau IF into DAX using VAR for the parameter SELECTEDVALUE and IF for conditional logic. All field references were transformed to the 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column] format and the parameter [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] was mapped to SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]).
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date]); parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
